flawed_nl_solution:
The farmer has 125 cows because 50 / 0.4 = <<50/0.4=125>>125
The farmer has 75 female cows because 125 x 0.6 = <<125*0.6=75>>75
The farmer will get 510 gallons of milk a day because 75 x 2 = <<75*2=510>>510
#### 510

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
